review_title: May be an effort towards better Indian Crime,Drama Movies.
review_detailed_main: OK lets chuck the fact that I don't exactly like Shahrukh Khan when it comes to something like action,I mean he is a good actor when it boils down to movies like Swadesh and Chak De India but he should really accept the fact that movies like Don should not be his cup of tea.Though there are many people who have loved this movie 10/10 but that is purely because of the fact that they love SRK and they don't exactly get movies so let me tell you in short what is actually in this movie without any spoilers (well there is nothing worth calling a spoiler in this movie).Indian South Asian Crime lord dreams it big and plans to get Europe now.Interpol is after him and strange enough all the lead positions in the globe are held by an Indian.Bad dialogues never end,horrible soundtracks popping in throughout the movie,amateur acting and yes predictable storyline.But the only good thing about the movie can be that maybe its a new start for Crime,Drama in Bollywood.

review_title: Its true! Don 2 is much much much better film then MI4!!!!
review_detailed_main:
And its better on many levels! But I am not here to compare these two movies!

Don2 is a Farhan Akhtar film and I have blind faith in this chap! He and his team has consistently contributed to Indian cinema with films that are class apart from rest of the Bollywood products! There always are high production values, world-class-level sensibilities, wonderful performances, awesome-awesome cinematography (I am fan of Jason West now!!!), brilliant cutting and music that gradually grows on you to an extent where it just settles in your mind forever!

Don2 is a very well made film. It is a perfect example of how a sequel should be. Shahrukh, Priyanka and Boman with the rest the rest of the awesome cast including the great Om Puri, have all made this film a delight to watch. There performances are subtle, realistic for cinematic sensibilities and most importantly believable!

There is no time wastage with any stupid comic relief scenes and none of the actions shots are repeated in slow motion to exaggerate action in film. Shot entirely outside India and with precision and awesome lighting and camera-work, this film is worth keeping in a library to be saved forever in case the world is about to be destroyed.

Few have compared the film to MI series and Ocean's Eleven series but trust me, it out does them in a very significant manner. All the action, storyline and the gadgetry is believable and realistic. For example when Don is escaping, there is sense of 'doubt' and 'mild uncertainty' that shows that he is not someone supernatural or super-heroic. He is just smart, clever and wise!

I can talk a lot about the film her but basically what I am trying to say is that this film is really good and it needs to be watched!

Don 2 is massive jump in the Indian standards of filmmaking and hopefully other filmmakers will get inspired by this film to up there cases!

Lastly, watch it in 3D! Its mindblowinng! So far we 've only seen Tron n Transformer in 3d which are full of mindless mental action but here we can see normal world scenes in 3d and they look beautiful!

* * * * * * * * * * (10 Stars!!!)

review_title: Don 2: SRK staves of his lack of lustre from Ra One
Sharukh Khan raises the bar as Don
review_detailed_main: Firstly I have to appreciate Sharukh Khan for his stellar performance and Farhan for directorial skills. SRK's acting is amazing and he simply takes audiences off the seat. Thanks to his great stylish looks and swift dialogues. The scene where SRK takes off his Hrithik Mask is just so believable. His want to loot the Euro currency plates and not the money there shows what Don stands for!! The ragged looks from the Prison scene to the clean stylish looks in the title song is a treat for the audiences. Priyanka, Kunal and Boman star with their acting. I must say that this stands out to be my best movie of the year and would love to have my personal DVD of this to watch again and again. This movie has come a long way from where Don first part had left you. Don 2 lives up to the expectations of what one would like to see in a Don movie. Kudos to the entire team for making a swashbuckling action thriller movie..

review_title: Shah Rukh back into d mainstream but in his own "Style"
review_detailed_main: This one starts right where the first one ended. Don 2 is a roller coaster ride with all the thrills,chills n smartness required! Music (background score incl.) could have been much much better, though I really commend that only one lip sync song was there and that too going with the flow of the story,no one would really miss the running behind the bushes type of a song. Coming to the direction it was quite good but the pace lacked in the initial few mins. And then the performances by one n all were A-class, SRK leading the pack like a Badshah,he was just superb a definite 10/10 for him! Priyanka,Boman,Kunal all were top notch! Om Puri wasn't given the best of lines though,a veteran like him deserved a better treatment. And last but not the least the locales,cinematography and action sequences were just fabulous. All the money spent is well worth and the whole country should be proud by this growth in film-making ! Bottom line: All SRK fans and even not his fans come watch a Game Changer in the lines of Mainstream commercial Bollywood movie. A must watch!

review_title: Farhan Akhtar Disappoints
The Best Action movie from India.
STUNNING !!! EPIC !!! Best movie from Bollywood EVER !!!!
review_detailed_main:
DON2 is a true master-piece and the first true international movie that Bollywood has ever made . I was left speechless viewing the grand-scale of the movie that matches or even surpasses many of Hollywood slick action-thrillers like MI-series , Bourne-series & Oceans-series .

The plot of the movie is better if kept a secret here because I would have to give a lot of spoilers right away then though it's a heist story . It has some unthinkable twists and turns and a thrilling climax to boast off .

The movie is slickest and most stylish action thrillers ever made that has witty one-liners by SRK and even the other actors . It moves at break-neck speed and is devoid of the usual songs / drama of usual Bollywood movies that i hate . Locales of BERLIN , ZURICH , THAILAND & MALAYSIA are simply breath-taking.

Performance wise , SRK-King Khan excels once again and carries off gorgeous drop-dead looks with loads of attitude and charisma . His walk and talk is brilliant. Priyanka Chopra and Boman Irani are superb .

Go For It because it's the best of Bollywood and it easily beats the recently released MI4 in every frame . You are going to love it whether you like or hate Indian cinema .

EPIC !! EPIC !! Next Level !!!!!!!

review_title: What an excellent return of King........ It's amazing!!!!!!!!!!!!!
review_detailed_main:
First thing first, director Frahan Akhtar has taken crime thriller to a new level with Don 2. In one words, Don 2 stands parrallel to Hollywood's Mision Impossible and James Bond movies.

The action sequences of the film is not lacking behind Hollywood movies. You will love to watch fight, car chase, destruction and demolition scenes of the movie. dailogue delivery in the fim is also brilliant but the film lacks on emotional quotient.

After playing negative roles in Darr and Bazigar, Shah Rukh has taken the villanious role to another height. He is arrogant, wicked and agile. Don is like a wild cat, who has no emotions.

The film starts from the climax of the previous film, where don surfaces in Thailand. He creates mayhem and destruction in Thailand but in a surprising move, he surrenders before his old enemy cop Roma (Priyanka Chopra). After surrender, Don is sent to a Malaysian prison. From where, the movie actually takes off to brilliant journey of conspiracy to steal the currency plates of Euro from a high security vault in Berlin. You must love to watch jail break sequence of Don along with old foe Vardhan (Boman Irani).

You must book your show for the movie on the Christmas eve. For its brilliant script and action sequences, the movie deserves 10 Star rating.

but here, there is no story line, looks like mixture of a bunch of Hollywood movies like Die Hard 1, MI1 etc.... in trying to add more suspense and twist the movie lost it's significance....Don knows everything... his partners and police force are complete fool...In the end he knows that Roma will not shoot him even after he killed her Brother..

just some actions and some dialogue are good but you can't enjoy a movie without a significant story and characters....

review_title: Amazing!!!
review_detailed_main:
Today, finally I watched the much awaited movie DON 2. Really need to appreciate the impeccable vision of Mr. Farhan Akhtar who makes everything so perfect about all his movies. Say it is the sets, the environment or just the look and feel of the movie, everything stands out.

Same goes with DON 2 as well. The feel of the movie went exactly the way it was meant to be. Amazing action sequences, and not to mention the extraordinary styling of the superstar Mr. Shah Rukh Khan suits the mood completely. No doubt this movie would not be the way it is without him. Say him with the long haired rowdy look or the clean shaved; he just makes it amazing to watch on screen. Boman Irani did his part as usual good. Priyanka Chopra did her job well.

Superbly written dialogues, much better presented by Mr. Shah Rukh Khan.

Talking about the story and the flow of the movie, the first half was just above average, seriously speaking all that made the first half work was SRK. Second half is what the movie is all about how the actual plan works out. Amazingly executed, keeps the grip of the story as well as the viewers' attention. Good to see only one song in the movie, too many songs could have killed the tension anyway, again the credit for it goes to Mr. Farhan Akhtar. Throughout the story you kind of guess that something is coming, there is a catch to it even then you get dumb struck when you see how the suspense gets revealed.

Amazing work everyone, brilliantly done, and it won't be a mistake to say that the new era in the way the Indian movies are made has changed and a great contribution in it goes to Mr. Farhan Akhtar.

MUST WATCH..... 8/10.

review_title: Panning out to a franchise
Non-stop action...and not much more
review_detailed_main:
I enjoyed Shah Rukh Khan's remake of "Don". While I normally do NOT like action/gangster films, this one worked for me because although the identical stranger angle was ridiculous, if you put that aside and just enjoyed the film for what it was, it worked well. So, it's not surprising that I would then watch "Don 2"...a film which did NOT exactly captivate me. The biggest reason, simply, is that it was a film that was all action....and nothing else....and much of it made little sense.

The story begins with some drug dealers in Europe meeting to discuss Don. It seems this Asian drug lord is looking to Europe...and they don't want to lose their grip on the drug trade. So, they hire assassins to kill him...leading to the dumbest scene in the movie. The 20 or so assassins all have guns and several are only a few feet away from him...yet he manages to kill them all and escape!! Right then, I knew I was not watching a great film but one that requires the audience to turn off their collective brains in order to enjoy it.

What follows is a complicated caper where Don orchestrates the theft of plates so he can print Euros. But he chooses a bunch of men who hate him and have every reason to betray him...leading to the betrayal that pretty much everyone watching expects.

So is it good? Yes and no. If all you want is action and a few twists, you'll love it. If you want more depth and believability, then try another film. As for me, I just had a hard time caring for such a smug and evil man...and the film was a time-passer for me and nothing more.

review_title: "If you don't like DON, you won't like DON"
review_detailed_main: Seriously amazing! Only word comes in the mind when we leave the theater. I haven't seen any Indian action movie better than this. Acting: SRK as SRK :)the way he carried DON..fabulous Job..In movie DON takes time to grow on you..but when it does, you will love the charm and wittiness. having said that, DON is not charming all the time..he can be really very furious at times. I think that part of his character is tricky and must say well managed by Shahrukh. Priyanka has done full justice to Roma's character. the turmoil in her heart when DON is around is clear and expressed elegantly. Besides looking vivacious she has performed well in action scenes also. Boman Irani is once again at his very ease and delivered couple of very good ones unfortunately hasn't got the opportunity much besides climax. Direction/Cinematography: Direction is good and sometimes great. By far the best in recent time for any action or thriller in Indian cinema. Only small portion which lacks some great camera work is chase sequence between Roma and DON, that has a bit bigger margin of improvement. Fight scenes are brilliantly choreographed and raising the bar for Indian films. Screenplay/ Dialogues: Writing is very slick and very neathas necessary twists and turns. Dialogues are awesome, exactly what a character like DON needs. Not only DON, Vardhan and Roma also have there little shares. 8 out of 10, but +1 for being a breakthrough in Indian film making style. Between writing this I am feeling like watching it againthat's the beautyyou will never feel you had enough of DON.

review_title: No logic!

Shah Rukh Khan pulls off everything so well that is the only saving grace for the viewer to forget about the poor script.

review_title: Don 2 can be called a well made film in almost all aspects.
review_detailed_main:
In an Iconic scene in The Godfather (1972) , Marlon Brando ( Vito Corleone ) delivered a sarcastic dialogue that is remembered as one of the greatest in Motion-Picture history , He said and i quote " I'll make him an offer he cant refuse ". 40 years later comes another such character played by Shah Rukh Khan who asks an interpol officer and i quote " Make me an offer I cant refuse " .That my friends is DON . A Man who will make you feel threatened even when you have him at Point-Blank range .

Don would do everything in a manner that is as stylish and sleek as possible and would not want to do it without anyone knowing as other criminals would but he would rather flaunt his intellect . He would say dialogues in his praise and keep an associate or foe until he needs them .His intension of a chase would not be to escape but to tease the cops and make them follow until he convinces some superficial contentment of his . To play a role with such characteristics requires an actor who can convince them and as the director of the film Farhan Akthar says , No one but Shah Rukh Khan can play DON .

The first film had don take over the Asian underworld , this film deals with how don enters the European underworld with an intension to carry out a robbery in which he wants to attain the printing plates of 100 and 50 euros . A master plan is evolved followed by a dramatic ending . Don 2 is the best Indian film in the action-thriller genre and manages to be one of the best sequels made so far in bollywood . It can be called a well made film in almost all aspects .

From direction to cinematography to costumes to production design , everything is of a certain standard that defines the sleek theme of the film and its main protagonist . Farhan Akthar is amazing behind the camera and has kept up to the tag of being a sensible film-maker who is wonderful at his craft .

The action and stunt sequences are done with a certain classy impeccable finish , the fight sequences are done with a real-time camera without any effects at all . It has car-chases A rope-fall from a 300ft building , hand-hand combat , gun-fights and many other constituents of an action film . But the romantic angle towards the end is what will make it standout from other global films of this genre . Trust me every portion of the film including the romantic track will seem realistic and appropriate .

All the performances are well done , Everyone does their part in the supporting act , be it Boman Irani ,Kunal Kapoor , Priyanka Chopra , Om Puri or the rest of the supporting cast . But then it is very difficult to stand out when Shah Rukh Khan occupies the same frame as you . He dazzles in this role that he effortlessly plays .

The caption of the film is a little deceiving , It reads "THE KING IS BACK" , but then he was always here and with this film , he has only reiterated his rule . DON is a role tailor-made for Shah Rukh Khan. He mesmerizes in every scene , every dialogue , every expression . He defines power in a cool and sleek manner . He makes negativity seem attractive . His performance is above par and reminds you of his timeless classics Darr and Baazigar. His dialogue delivery is magneficient and has that smartly evil tone to it . For all those who criticise him on various levels even after such performances , here's a note tweeted by a shahrukh fan in Austria : Is he the best actor ? maybe not , the biggest star ? maybe not , The best human being ? mybe not ,The best marketing strategist ? maybe not . Then what is he exactly ? He is just Shah Rukh Khan ... The King of a billion hearts .

The film is well paced and will entertain you throughout , especially in the last half-an-hour . The twists and turns are well placed , with the obvious turning to be oblivious to the eye . Shahrukh is looking his best and gives one of his greatest acting performances till date . Its a movie experience one cannot miss this year !

5/5 says the die-hard crazy Shah Rukh Khan fan in me , 4.5/5 says the analytic critic in me . This could by far be the worst review i have written , for my vocabulary is deficient when it comes to being able to efficiently review this film .

Review by , E.A.Abhishek .

review_title: Finally a BOND in Bollywood
review_detailed_main: I have been on a travel and came across to watch this new outing by Farhan Akhtar, Just to be clear in the start in order not to have this Review as biased. I have always liked Farhan's work as it shows his talent and horizons on how to approach a certain story. This movie has it's good and bad, lately i have seen Shahrukh Khan's movie and my last best of him was Chak De India, His other movies may have done business or may have broken or not the records at box office. In terms of approaching a new character and taking it to a next level, this is what he has done in Don 2. I have thoroughly enjoyed his performance. It had a lot of arrogance and swagger to it. I would really like to see his this performance in the Best Actor / Villain Category at various award functions to come and my instincts tell me he might win a dozen. The movie has nothing to do with Don from 2006, it has a complete new look and style to take the story further and in a better way. This time round the direction and pace of movie is FAST and it really is FAST. Farhan has always been reputed of being slow in story telling but this one had it's fair share of a Thriller. It kept me glued and i wasn't bored. Indian cinema has been really low on stories or scripts or how ever the cinematic people may call it, and same is this movie, but for an Indian movie it's one of it's kind and it will surely win accolades for that. Cinematography, Action, Stunts are all world class and at par with many Hollywood movies. That is so i have read the movie is much more appreciated by the critics and audiences outside India. Rest of the cast has done their fair share to what they have been told to do, even though, i don't agree with the choice of few characters ( the actors playing them). There is always room for more and improvement in franchises like this one and it has surely raised the bar way way ahead for it's next part to come. This is the BOND of Bollywood. I'd really like to give it another watch once the Blu-Ray is out and would highly recommend this. 8/10

review_title: A copy-paste of Prison Break!!!
review_detailed_main:
Yes! The movie looks really good but if you guys ever see the popular Hollywood TV Show Prison Break (2005-2009), you will see a lots of ideas have been taken from that!

Like Prison Break, Don gets into a Prison to take out Vardhaan where in Prison Break Michael Scofield got into Fox River to get his brother out of there.

A lots of similarity between Prison Break's "scylla" and the thing Don wanted to steal. A lots of similarities on the security of that.

Also, you will see the similarity on running in the car on Don 2 and Prison Break.

In overall, Don 2 may look like a very very unique idea to those who have never seen the TV show Prison Break (2005-2009). But its nothing special to those who have already seen Prison Break! I'd rather recommend to watch Prison Break instead of it. In other words Don 2 is a summary of Prison Break with some modifications in Hindi Language! That's what I got to say about it!

Farhan, we're waiting :)

review_title: A slick stylish action thriller
Good Entertainer, The King is Back
Indian Movie, or MI?
review_detailed_main: This film embodies almost everything I don't watch an Indian movie for. If I watch an Indian movie I want to see either Indian song & dance entertainment, Indian scenery, an Indian political drama, or and Indian crime drama. Keyword: Indian. As in... takes place in India, I see India, I learn something about India, I get to enjoy Indian pop culture. I do not wish to see Berlin, London , Bangkok, Paris, Zurich, etc. I do not wish to see blonde babes dancing. I do not wish to see dancers in western, urban clothing. I do not want rap. Not all those faults are in this particular film, but those that are are dominant. Shahrukh Kahn pretending he is Tom Cruise? Gimme a break. I'd rather see him in a sari. Two stars for the explosions.

review_title: Ra-1 was a bad dream
One of the best action thrillers of bollywood!!
review_detailed_main:
Don 2 is the best action thriller of bollywood in recent times. The story, screenplay, action, photography all exceed the other Hindi movies and also a few big Hollywood action movies.

After Don, I had huge expectations from Farhan Akhtar and Shahrukh Khan, and after watching Don 2 i am glad to say that they matched my expectations.

The story is well written and what makes the movie more thrilling is the screenplay which doesn't go flat. Also the hand-to-hand combat is never before seen in Hindi movies-which are more or less following South Indian movies regarding action as seen over past couple of years. The film is also well shot which adds to the thrill... Shahrukh Khan's performance is one of his best, other cast also play the part well.

Overall, Don 2 goes beyond Bollywood till date in most aspects and is a movie which can match international standards...

review_title: Flop.One is followed by Flop 2.
Srk and Farhan show what is meant by Donism and Machoism
review_detailed_main:
First of all let me tell you that i am a big fan of king khan and seldom miss the opportunity of catching his movies at the first day first show slot.His last release Ra one was extremely disappointing even to the eyes of an ardent admirer like me.So needless to say lot was riding on Don 2 even more than before considering the fact king khan went on to win great accolades with the remake of yesteryear's classic Don where Mr Bachhan gave a stellar performance.

As usual i went in advance to book my tickets but unfortunately i couldn't manage to procure a ticket for the first show so i had to be contended with the ticket of the second show.i went along with 2 of my buddies who are not a great fan of king khan but loyal followers of the don brand.The movie kicked off with some drug mafia secretly planning to execute don.That was followed by a thunderous applause and the crowd shouting without giving a damn about their vocal cords when don in his lethal avatar with his sunglass,flaunting his long locks and smoking as if "He is the king of the world"appeared on the big screen. The clamor got me engaged and i got immersed in the movie and i guarantee you that the spell has not faded off yet.

I completely fell in love with the slyness and shrewdness of Don how he surrenders to the police and ultimately how he managed to convince Boman to escape with him and become an accomplice in his plan of robbing >>>>>>>no no don't get me wrong not Euros but the metal plate impressions of the currency.Hrithik plays a cameo and ultimately to everyone's bewilderment turns out to be don himself.The car chase sequence was a visual treat and a trillion times better than all the VFX effects of Ra one combined together.Everyone fitted into their roles almost perfectly but don along with Boman and of course to a certain extent the jungle Billi were just Omg.The element of deceit in the movie was sculpted with utmost meticulousness and nonchalance.you cannot read don's mind and neither his eyes as to what is he planning next.The adroitness and conniving nature of don is so magnificently handled by king khan that u cannot but help admiring him even if you are his most severest critique.ultimately don says that either all his enemies have been killed or locked behind bars and laughs sadistically although i assure many would love to see themselves smile in the same way as don because every person harbors some traits of don inside their heart and we cannot but help let it come out.watch out for the climax as it is sure to leave u speechless and u cannot help but be in awe of the aura of don.

Finally Farhan has also decided to script Don 3 and he has given a hint in the movie.i would recommend this movie anytime,anywhere.on a concluding note i often thought how can a person be named don.now come on must be he has a real name.Farhan said a couple of days ago that according to fiction he adorns the name of Marc Donald to which king khan wittingly replied that then jungle billi may have been acknowledged with the name of "Donald Duck"

review_detailed_main: Amazing movie...they made it like hollywood style...amazingly done action sequences..nd the classic don climax just amazing

review_title: The best Bollywood Action movie
review_detailed_main:
MY REVIEW OF DON 2

Plot Synopsis

After a gap of 5 years, Don decides to expand his business into Europe..But in order to do so he teams up with his old nemesis Vardhaan...

Acting

SRK was just amazing as Don..he takes the whole character of Don into another level with this movie...He can shoulder the movie entirely by himself at any point..but fortunately the supporting cast is great too... Priyanka's role is more engaging in the second half after a lackluster first half..Boman Irani too extends upon his character,Vardhaan, to excellent performances...Kunal also does a fine job..Lara Dutta is just eye candy (very very hot candy too)

Acting-4/5

Story

Unlike Don (2006),the sequel is more of a heist thriller..Its fast, completely action oriented and has twists every now and then.The story at times is a bit stretched but the on screen performances manage to push past such holes.. So far Don2 is the best of the this genre in Bollywood..

Story-4/5

Action

Don2 takes action to another level..The action sequences are well placed and the car chases are nicely handled..The fights are brief and don't prolong too much..

Action-5/5

Music

Shankhar Ehsaan Loy nearly messes up in this department..The music even though nice and catchy resembles too much to Don(2006).. Farhan however used just one music sequence in Don2 (Zaraa Dil Kho),and Hai Ye Maya is used brilliantly for a montage of how the team prepares to rob a bank.. Dushman Mera is used during the credits...All the songs are just superbly shot..

Music Picturisation-4.5/5

Direction

Farhan proves once again hes one of the best with Don2..With Don2 ,he completely rejuvenates the titular character Don...In every scene of this movie he adds style..He also handles the heist part of the movie very well too..Don2 is easily the best heist movie Bollywood has ever come up with.. Editing is sharp and much care has been given to not drag certain scenes..

Direction-4/5

Movie-Don2 Don2 will be remembered as the most stylish movie ever in Bollywood..It not only carries the style but has enough substance within it too..The character of Don has been given a fresh storyline to work through..From the start to the finish ,its SRK's portrayal of Don that captures the complete attention of the viewers..Some parts of the story do stretch a bit but its just a minor flaw.. A complete family entertainer,the Best of 2011......

Don 2---9.5/10

review_title: DON 2 - Style, Intrigue, Suspense and Attitude

Now thats what we call action!
review_detailed_main:
OK guys, first and foremost, this is a real review! I saw the movie in Southampton, UK and my my, what a movie it was! I had excellent expectations from this one, as unlike Ra. One, it had a fabulous director in Farhan Akhtar! The trailers too looked excellent.. I won't tell much of the story, but as it can be made out from the trailers..Don get Vardhaan out of jail, to fill his purpose of getting to a vault in Berlin (they key of which is with Vardhaan)..Its a simple story but the way its told is excellent..What works highly in the favour of Don 2 is that it doesn't try to be too much of a bollywood-movie (that's exactly what spoiled Ra.one for me)...no dame...no emotions..just one song (barring hai yeh maya in the BG and one in the end credits)..so what remained was just pure action..the car chase sequence especially worked wonders for me..

StarCast: SRK SRK SRK! This is the reason we call him the king! He's absolutely splendid..his expressions, his style, his charisma, perfect! Priyana Chopra too looks excellent in her role! Kunal Kapoor is decent..So is Boman Irani..Lara Dutta and OmP Puri get short roles with not much scope..Nawwab Shah is fine too..Hrithik Roshan in his guest role looks as classy as a human can look..

Direction/Script : Amazing..farhan akhtar looks at his best..its slick, solid and smart..its only for a few moments towards the end when you feel why SRK is unnecessarily showing romantic signs towards Priyanka..but when you come to know why, you just can't resist being astonished.. Not to forget the action (which i thought) was the best i have ever seen in a Hindi movie..

Music : Zaraa Dil is good (a treat in 3D) while Hai Yeh Maya appears smartly in the BG..speaking of which, the BG music throughout the movie is splendid..Dushman Mera fills into the end credits..

All in all, a splendid watch if you are/or not an action lover..SRK simply at his best..should definitely pick up business and end up among the highest grossers of Bollywood..a sure-shot Christmas treat for all..just one thing to say, the King is Back!

review_title: Good action movie
review_detailed_main:
Watched the movie on 24th Night. Being a SRK fan, watching a second day last show is disappointing for myself. But...better late than never.

Now, the main task.... review

Story/Concept/Theme: Don is back and this time wants to make an entry to Europe drug market. But he has his rivals who want him dead. He then makes another plan to finish his contenders and make himself billions. Loot DCB plates! Rest of the movie is on how he executes this plan.

Character development: There is one character who is seen in the whole movie i.e. SRK. And his character is already developed. I was surprised to see his Don character to be so mean and witty this time. In Don1 he was not this witty. Then there was Roma and other few persons who just floats on surface. In short...if you are discussing character development, Don2 is not a fitting example.

Direction: Well, like many out there I'm a fan of Farhan Akhtar too. Many of you are there who have a blind faith that if Amir Khan makes a movie it must be some revolutionary movie, I've kinda same faith on Farhan Akhtar. Only revolution I found here is action choreography and camera work. Oh, and I must admit I appreciate the quirky dialogs. Nothing exceptional here...

One thing I've observed...I don't know if anyone would agree with me...is that Don is no more a overpowering, overshadowing supervillain anymore. He's kind of a super thief now. A bit like Jack Sparrow. Intelligent, sarcastic, mean and sleek.

Screenpaly: Screenpaly is good. It gets slow the moment Priyanka is on screen. I think Farhan was not sure how to use Roma's character. She was absent in 80% of the movie and just slowed down the pace whenever on screen. (oh that was not screenplay related...hmmm) I liked the dialogs. Though the theft idea was childish, at least the crew took it seriously.

Acting: SRK is handled properly. A bit more mean would have been better. Rest of the characters played along well.

Cinematography: Camera-work is really appreciative. A bit of Malaysia and Germany is captured well. Then comes camera movements in time of action, which was also good. not shaky, no un-necessary close-ups or focus on muscle or slow-moing the finisher punch. Good job.

Action and 3D: Action choreography is really good and I'm impressed. Recently I'm seeing the realistic fighting in Hindi movies. It feels you are fighting with a worthy opponent. Proper chops and punches, blood if necessary...a few cool finisher moves. If you are still not sure if you should watch this, go for action only, you won't be disappointed. 3D is bad...like baaaad

Songs and background score: All but one are used as background score. So no more annoying song-dance sequence in the movie to bore you. Not very remarkable job from Shankar-Ehsan-Loy trio. A few forgettable hummable tunes thats all.

Editing: Should have edited few parts with Roma. Keep only scenes which impacts movie and should have edited last emo scene with Roma in bank vault. And obviously Arjun's scenes.

Few additional words: The moment the movie released it started a buzz. Lame movie, copy of this and that, nothing new and obviously SRK sucks. Well, I would like to say something on these. The movie is not lame. There are more bank robbery movies with more lolable concepts. At least this was better. Not much challenges in terms of bank vault breaking but good approach and scene structure. Copy of MI and Oceans...come on guys, I understand if you have seen only one movie on the bank robbery theme and only MI for jump scenes. Someone jumped from a high rise...that is not a MI copy. That is someone jumped from a high rise. And all robbery (not only bank safes but all kind of safes) movies had their own set of hurdles before you reach the main vault/safe/box/etc without proper authentication. What is the hype and hoopla if the challenges matches with one or few movies. Stop being a movie-know-it-all and stop boasting I-see-Hollywood-movies-I've-seen-it-all-and-I'm-not-impressed. Nothing new...none promised you anything new. Its a movie. Enjoy it the way you have enjoyed Singham, Dabaang, Bodyguard etc craps. And from the day Don2 was announced to be in production...I guess none in the world expected an intelligent brainfcuk movie. So...shut-up. SRK sucks...if you are a SRK hater. He always sucks for you. If you are a neutral guy...you might tend to appreciate his acting this time. Overacting?...Not this time at least. And if you are a fan, he's beyond the petty matters like perfection, overacting etc

Verdict: One time watch for sure. The movie takes time to build up the plot and slow a pace but after intermission its a joyride for action lovers.

review_title: Stylish Direction

review_title: Great movie
Best Thriller Action
review_detailed_main: From Bollywood best thriller action movie i ever seen..the performance is top of the notch by Shah Rukh khan..

review_title: Good
review_detailed_main:
While it might not be the best opinion to classify young writers and directors to a specific style or segment, there is something compelling and unique about the story telling of great directors that makes their fans count days for the release. Story writers in this category not only leave lasting impressions, but always carry a trademark of their method and style which brings that smile in the end, even when they explore diverse subjects or hop genres. Farhan Akhtar is the man who gave us that range with DCH and Lakshya,yet maintained the sincerity and joy of telling a story. Don 2 ladies and gentlemen, is just the opposite.

Is it fair to expect Farhan not to experiment or go blazing commercial Hindi masala with this subject? Absolutely not and complements to him for taking it further, but could he have done this with more love for the character Don, and packed it with the honesty of Lakshya or the freshness of DCH, a resounding yes! Who better than him to do it. Without drawing any comparisons to the original or comparing it to others, the movie miserably lacks a soul. The least a writer and director can do is be fascinated and inspired by the character and the story of Don. This one taints the cinematic image of Don. Clichéd dialog's and disconnected sequences prove more attention was given to make it look hip and sexy, and not make it real. We have all seen the MI series, the 007's, and others like them and they are all incomplete without the cars, gadgets, and the geeky thrills, but pick any good one from the lot and you will see they were all used to complement the story. Very unlike Don 2.

The movie is drenched in classic SRK drama,and you are better off watching a Karan Johar movie than this, at least you will not be surprised by anything. For instance, the movie kicks of by a bunch of big shots conspiring to kill don, and you are a genius if you were able to figure why by the end, or even why it started the way it did, but then I'm talking logic here. How about the poor dialog's and not so funny humor portrayed by SRK? Jabbar the villain is shown more as a personal assistant and, reflects a character that was either not developed or incompletely written. Priyanka Chopra puts in a decent performance to a minimal role and Om Puri could have easily taken a pass on this. Boman Irani does justice to his character but again, his character's evolution as well as introduction does not hit the mark.

review_title: The king of Indian movie
review_detailed_main:
"Don 2" is a Bollywood action thriller directed by Farhan Akhtar and starring Shah Rukh Khan. The film follows the story of Don, a cunning criminal, and his elaborate plan to steal valuable currency plates from a high-security bank in Berlin. Shah Rukh Khan delivers a captivating performance as Don, portraying the character's intelligence and charm effectively.

The Hollywood king movie... The movie received generally positive reviews for its slick direction, stylish action sequences, and Shah Rukh Khan's charismatic portrayal of the anti-hero. The film's cinematography, editing, and gripping storyline were also praised. Additionally, the supporting cast, including Priyanka Chopra and Boman Irani, contributed well to the overall narrative.

Overall, "Don 2" is an engaging action thriller that showcases Shah Rukh Khan's versatility as an actor and provides audiences with a thrilling and entertaining cinematic experience. I recommend this movie I love it.

review_title: Don 2
review_detailed_main: Don 2 is a 2011 Indian Hindi-language action thriller film written, co-produced and directed by Farhan Akhtar. It is the second installment in the Don reboot series. Jointly produced by Excel Entertainment and Red Chillies Entertainment, the film stars Shah Rukh Khan as the titular anti-hero, with Priyanka Chopra, Boman Irani, Lara Dutta, Om Puri, Nawab Shah, Alyy Khan, Rajesh Khattar, Sahil Shroff and Kunal Kapoor playing supporting roles. A sequel to Don (2006), the film's story takes place 5 years after the previous film when Don (Shah Rukh Khan), a ruthless international drug lord, plans to take over the European drug cartel. Meanwhile, Roma (Priyanka Chopra) has joined the Interpol to hunt him down.

review_title: Extra points for trying , and succeeding!
review_detailed_main:
I saw this movie 2 times when it released. And to this day , I'm happy how it turned out

We have not seen a better heist film in Bollywood after don 2. It's production , it's story beats everything both , Dhoom 3 and Players which were even based on Hollywood film and Don 2 wasnt. Which is another plus!

It could've been much much better. But this film has a certain charm. It feels like a holly flick. Only negatives are charachter buildups and pace.

Charachters aren't really connected emotionally. They're just there to serve the purpose.

Pace is really weird. It opens with an action sequence , to an slow enquiry sequence , to a good prison sequence to a song. This shift in pace dosent add upto the suspense it could've have delivered

review_title: Don 2 Movie Review
Awesome movie, worth watching
review_detailed_main:
It has been five years since Don made his escape and is now out to conquer the Western World. Only he has to ensure that his enemies don't get (kill) him.

Starring Shahrukh Khan, Priyanka Chopra, Lara Dutta, Boman Irani, Om Puri, Kunal Kapoor, Florian Lukas and Sahil Shroff. Music is by Shankar Ehsaan Loy. Lyrics By Javed Akhtar. Directed By Farhan Akhtar. The movie is Produced By Farhan Akhtar, Shahrukh Khan and Ritesh Sidhwani.

Shahrukh Khan's previous release, "RA ONE," may not have done well as expected but this has. Shahrukh Khan has proved, once again, that he is able to do such action roles. He is convincing as the "DON" and this role has suited. His expressions and the way he delivers his dialogues, make one feel convinced. However, his hairstyle is to be watched out for.

Priyanka Chopra makes a return as "Roma." Only this time she has a more meatier part then she did in 2006 and this suits her more now then it did five years back. Here, her character, "Roma" has joined the Interpol and she is determined to catch Don.

Lara Dutta has replaced Isha Koppikar and plays the character, "Ayesha," who is all the time with the Don. Boman Irani returns as "Vaardhan," who was caught by the Police five years back and Om Puri, also returns as CBI Officer Vishal Malik. But one actor, who did a good job of his role, is Kunal Kapoor as a man who helps DON.

Farhan Akhtar has returned to be behind the cameras and not in front of them. While, his father, Javed Akhtar, has written good lyrics for the music directors Shankar Ehsaan Loy to compose.

The action sequences, especially in 3D, are worth watching out.

review_title: Best Action movie
review_detailed_main: One of the best performances of shahrukh khan..Really enjoyed the movie💯

review_title: Complete Entertainer
review_detailed_main: "Don 2" is a stylish and exhilarating Bollywood action thriller that elevates the suspense and intrigue of its predecessor. Shah Rukh Khan reprises his role as the enigmatic Don, delivering a charismatic performance that keeps viewers on the edge of their seats. Farhan Akhtar's direction, combined with stunning cinematography and well-choreographed action sequences, adds a sleek and international flair to the film. The engaging plot, filled with twists and turns, keeps the audience guessing until the end. With a mix of high-octane action, clever heist elements, and Khan's magnetic screen presence, "Don 2" stands out as a thrilling and visually impressive cinematic experience.

review_title: An Excellent Thriller
review_detailed_main: Don 2 is a slick and stylish movie. It has an intelligent and gripping storyline which keeps you glued to the screen in anticipation. The movie begins where its prequel left off. Don, after becoming the king of the Asian underworld, is on a quest to conquer the European underworld. But he has to face the existing bosses of the European underworld and many other obstacles to get what he wants. The twists and turns in the movie are intriguing and the climax blows your mind away. Direction by Farhan Akhtar is really great. The action sequences look very realistic especially when compared to what is generally seen in bollywood. The action is on par with Hollywood. The locations in Thailand and Berlin are shot beautifully. Performance by all the actors is good. Shahrukh Khan is amazing as Don. In my opinion, Shahrukh is the only actor today who has the charisma to portray the character of Don so convincingly. Priyanka Chopra does well as Roma showing love and hate relationship with Don. Other actors like Om Puri, Boman Irani, Kunal Kapoor were also good in their respective roles. Dialogues are the USP of the movie and Shahrukh's dialogue delivery is stellar. It's like Don has got a dialogue for every situation which makes him look really cool. The songs fit well with the situation in the movie. Keeping in mind that it is an action thriller movie, Shankar-Ehsaan-Loy have done a good job. There are no unnecessary romantic or dance numbers to disrupt the flow of the movie. The background score is really good during action sequences. Every movie has its share of flaws, so has this one. There are a few plot holes in the movie. Many action sequences look copied/inspired from Hollywood flicks. To sum up, I would like to say that Don 2 is one of the best action thriller movies to come out of bollywood. It is a treat for Shahrukh fans.

review_title: MASTERPIECE
review_detailed_main:
MASTERPIECE!!!

This is the most epic film to watch in 2020 especially in quarantine. Its an absolute masterpiece and so well scripted. Its the only best crime/action film in bollywood to watch. The story is so well written and every scene of the film have made sense and real logic! Every shot and scene has directed so good. This film is definitely originally made and somehow is better than the first part.

The dialogues were great. The storyline was sometimes predictable but at the end it totally changes. When I watched the movie I thought I was watching a Hollywood Movie. Shahrukh Khan is the only actor who can play Don cause he has that style, the charisma and everything you need in an underworld king who wants to be the king of Europe. Boman Irani plays the role of Vardhan really well.
